interface.name: netutils_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute network utilities in the netutils domain.

interface.name: netutils_run
interface.summary: Execute network utilities in the netutils domain, and allow the specified role the netutils domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the netutils domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the netutils domain to use.

interface.name: netutils_exec
interface.summary: Execute network utilities in the caller domain.

interface.name: netutils_domtrans_ping
interface.summary: Execute ping in the ping domain.

interface.name: netutils_kill_ping
interface.summary: Send a kill (SIGKILL) signal to ping.

interface.name: netutils_run_ping
interface.summary: Execute ping in the ping domain, and allow the specified role the ping domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the ping domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the ping domain to use.

interface.name: netutils_run_ping_cond
interface.summary: Conditionally execute ping in the ping domain, and allow the specified role the ping domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the ping domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the ping domain to use.

interface.name: netutils_exec_ping
interface.summary: Execute ping in the caller domain.

interface.name: netutils_domtrans_traceroute
interface.summary: Execute traceroute in the traceroute domain.

interface.name: netutils_run_traceroute
interface.summary: Execute traceroute in the traceroute domain, and allow the specified role the traceroute domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the traceroute domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the traceroute domain to use.

interface.name: netutils_run_traceroute_cond
interface.summary: Conditionally execute traceroute in the traceroute domain, and allow the specified role the traceroute domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the traceroute domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the traceroute domain to use.

interface.name: netutils_exec_traceroute
interface.summary: Execute traceroute in the caller domain.

desc.p: Control users use of ping and traceroute
